name: The Foundation Stick for Hydrating, Buildable Coverage and Natural Finish
about: What it is: A buttery-soft, buildable, and lightweight foundation stick that evens out skin tone and leaves your skin with a natural glow...Coverage: Full..Finish: Natural..Formulation: Stick..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Aloe Vera Extract: Supports collagen production and visibly improves elasticity..- Vitamin E: An antioxidant that facilitates skin hydration..- Apricot Butter: Helps nurture, revitalize, and soften skin...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan and cruelty-free.
ingredients: -Aloe Vera Extract: Supports collagen production and visibly improves elasticity..-Vitamin E: An antioxidant that facilitates skin hydration..-Apricot Butter: Helps nourish, revitalize, and soften skin...Phenyl Trimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Octyldodecyl Myristate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Polyethylene, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Microcrystalline Wax, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Retinyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sorbic Acid.(+/-) Iron Oxides (CI 77492, CI 77491, CI 77499), Mica (CI 77019), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Before applying, moisturize and prime skin based on skin type..-For light coverage, apply foundation in the center of the face and blend out with fingers, beauty sponge, or dense foundation brush..-For medium to full coverage, apply foundation in the center of the face and blend out with a dense foundation brush..-To build coverage, re-apply foundation in desired areas and blend...For textured skin:.-If applicable, apply stick directly on the face to spot-conceal any problem areas..-Apply product on a dense foundation brush and stipple into the skin, including spot-concealed areas. .-Repeat as needed to build coverage...-After applying, set foundation with your setting powder/spray of choice.
